name: Ninja Ranger Adventure - Power of Karate Kid
name_original: Ninja Ranger Adventure - Power of Karate Kid
description:
Ninja Ranger Adventure - Power of Karate Kid is a FREE retro action platformer adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!

Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks!

Help ninja ranger to jump up and down with just an easy touch.

Get bonus points by collecting coins. Get ranked in leaderboard.

Ninja Ranger Adventure - Power of Karate Kid is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
